input_args.passage: 'Mark E. Mitchell | Military Wiki - Fandom | Mark E. Mitchell was the first member of the United States Army to be awarded the Distinguished Service Cross during the War in Afghanistan (2001-present), ...'
input_args.claim: 'This information is corroborated by source, which states that he was the first member of the United States Army to be awarded the Distinguished Service Cross during the War in Afghanistan, which includes the Battle of Qala-i-Jangi.'
